inclusion.criterion: Patients must be 3 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have malignant glioma or recurrent ependymoma
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The tumor is located in the T-L spine, unresectable anaplastic astrocytoma s/p radiation.

inclusion.criterion: Tumor must be accessible for injection and must not be located in the brainstem or deep midbrain
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The tumor is located in the T-L spine

inclusion.criterion: Performance Score: Karnofsky ≥60% if >10y/o, Lansky ≥60 if ≤10y/o
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Bone Marrow Function: Patients must have adequate bone marrow function defined as a peripheral absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1000/µl, platelet count ≥ 100,000/µl (transfusion independent) and hemoglobin ≥ 8.0 gm/dL
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Renal Function: Patients must have serum creatinine ≤ 1.5 times upper limit of institutional normal for age and/or GFR ≥ 70 mL/min/1.73 m2.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Hepatic Function: Bilirubin ≤ 1.5 times institutional normal; SGPT (ALT) < 3 times institutional normal
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients with seizure disorder may be enrolled if well controlled
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of chronic pain, which could imply a seizure disorder, but it is not clear if it is well-controlled.

exclusion.criterion: Prior or ongoing liver disease including known cirrhosis, hepatitis B or C infection
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients on immunosuppressive drugs (with exception of corticosteroid)
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient is on high-dose steroids, which are an exception.

exclusion.criterion: Known history of HIV or underlying immunodeficiency
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with acute infections (viral, bacterial or fungal infections requiring therapy)
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient has a history of severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention s/p Foley catheter, but it is not clear if there are any ongoing infections.

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or breast-feeding patients. Female patients of childbearing age must have negative serum or urine pregnancy test within 1 week of beginning therapy
exclusion.label: met
exclusion.evidence: Patient is a man, so this criterion does not apply.

exclusion.criterion: Other serious co-morbid illness or compromised organ function
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient's Karnofsky performance score is unknown. The patient's bone marrow function, renal function, and hepatic function are also unknown.
